Title: Super Troopers
Overview: Five bored, occasionally high and always ineffective Vermont state troopers must prove their worth to the governor or lose their jobs. After stumbling on a drug ring, they plan to make a bust, but a rival police force is out to steal the glory.
production_companies: Fox Searchlight Pictures, Broken Lizard Industries
Cast: Jay Chandrasekhar, Steve Lemme, Kevin Heffernan
clean_text: super trooper five bored occasionally high ineffective vermont state trooper prove worth governor lose job stumble drug ring plan bust rival police force steal glory alter state police comedy crime mystery jay chandrasekhar jay chandrasekhar steve lemme kevin heffernan 2001
